docs.title: Overview
docs.text: The Freqtrade Operator manages Freqtrade trading bots on Kubernetes.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Persist user data with PVCs and bootstrap userdir via init container (7d7765c)

Replace emptyDir with a PersistentVolumeClaim for the user_data volume so data survives pod restarts. An init container runs freqtrade create-userdir to bootstrap the directory structure on first start. Adds an optional storage field to the CRD for configuring PVC size and storageClass.

Closes #4

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 noreply@anthropic.com

docs.title: Bug Fixes
docs.text:
• Add explicit namespace to ServiceAccount and Deployment templates (c1f4349)

Helm template rendering does not inject namespace into resource metadata, causing the ServiceAccount to be created in the wrong namespace when deployed via Tilt or other template-based tools.

Closes #2

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Use built-in SampleStrategy for simple-bot, make gitRepository optional (f2ee1ad)

Make gitRepository optional in the strategy CRD so bots can use freqtrade's built-in strategies without a git-sync sidecar. The update handler now fully reconciles the ConfigMap and Deployment on spec changes.

Closes #1

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 noreply@anthropic.com
